Texts.Eng: I knew you'd get the job done! Here you are, the armour and blueprints I promised you!

You look like a mech enthusiast! I've got some Enerth mech blueprints you might like, but I can't just give them away for free... If you can ^green;find me a ^orange;Salvaged Nano Receptable ^white;while you're ^green;out in space^white;, I'll give you the blueprints and some armour to boot!
